title: Mercury Transit in the 10th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting your tenth house sharpens professional communication, decision-making, and public image. Thinking becomes goal-oriented and strategic, focused on visibility, responsibility, and results. You may speak more in professional settings, handle negotiations, or manage information that shapes reputation. Career progress depends on clarity and accuracy rather than force. When guided consciously, this transit enhances leadership through intellect, strengthens authority via communication, and aligns revealed efforts with long-term career direction.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Mental focus on goals and outcomes.

closing: Mercury in the 10th house elevates career through intellect and communication. When clarity leads action, reputation strengthens steadily.
